Package uk.ac.rdg.resc.edal.grid

Class DerivedStaggeredGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.rdg.resc.edal.grid.AbstractHorizontalGrid
      • uk.ac.rdg.resc.edal.grid.DerivedStaggeredGrid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, DiscreteDomain<HorizontalPosition,​GridCell2D>, DiscreteHorizontalDomain<GridCell2D>, Domain<HorizontalPosition>, HorizontalDomain, HorizontalGrid, StaggeredHorizontalGrid
    public class DerivedStaggeredGrid
extends AbstractHorizontalGrid
implements StaggeredHorizontalGrid, Serializable
    A StaggeredHorizontalGrid which is derived from its original grid. All cell centres and boundaries are calculated from the nodes of the original grid.
    Author:
    Guy Griffiths
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • DerivedStaggeredGrid

        public DerivedStaggeredGrid​(HorizontalGrid originalGrid,
                            StaggeredHorizontalGrid.SGridPadding xPadding,
                            StaggeredHorizontalGrid.SGridPadding yPadding)
        Create a new DerivedStaggeredGrid
        Parameters:
        originalGrid - The original HorizontalGrid which this grid is based upon
        xPadding - The StaggeredHorizontalGrid.SGridPadding to be applied to the x-axis of the original grid
        yPadding - The StaggeredHorizontalGrid.SGridPadding to be applied to the y-axis of the original grid

      • getBoundingBox

        public BoundingBox getBoundingBox()
        Description copied from interface: HorizontalDomain
        Returns the bounding box of the domain in the domain's own coordinate reference system. For domains which do not have a native co-ordinate reference system this may return a BoundingBox in a different CRS. Consequently this BoundingBox is not guaranteed to be a tight bound around the domain.
        Specified by:
        getBoundingBox in interface HorizontalDomain
